name: Sky Wave
description:
Discover a fantasy world that is both stunning and dangerous with Sky Wave.

In this unique game you can multiply your character to help you get further than ever before. Each copy will also increase your score multiplier. See how big you can make your wave!

A 3D world filled with unique and dangerous obstacles. Procedurally generated so you get a new play experience every single time. Challenge your friends to see who can get the biggest wave of clones and highest score.

FEATURES:
-"One Touch" gameplay to control your entire wave.
-Unique character cloning system.
-Large selection of characters to unlock.
-Infinite and never repetitive gameplay.
-Challenge your friends score with Game Center.



How To Play:

1. Tap the screen to jump over obstacles.
2. Double tap to jump even higher.
3. Keep as many clones alive to increase your score multiplier.


Make sure to follow us on Instagram @nanovationlabs for the latest games!
